Articles.Content:
I create an everything blackhole and it sucks everything in.

My emptiness.

New page I love you!

**Edited <time datetime="2022-02-28T09:30:20Z" title="02/28/2022 09:30  AM" data-short="2 yr">February 28, 2022</time> by Abel101126**

Now there's a Venus on the empty space.

My Venus Hill... ummm... which hill?

I get the B52's to sing me up a Love Shack and move in.

My Love Shack on Venus.

Your smoldering shack on Venus.

My brick pizzeria on Venus.

Your Pizzeria leans so much that it falls over.

I rebuild my shack to be fire and acid proof.

I use C4 on your shack.

My hole.

Sadly your hole contains bits of your body as you failed to handle the C4 safely and blew yourself up.

Meanwhile my shack, designed to withstand the rigours of Venus didn't even feel it.

My super tough Venus enduring Love Shack near a hole with bits of person.

**Edited <time datetime="2022-03-01T10:06:17Z" title="03/01/2022 10:06  AM" data-short="2 yr">March 1, 2022</time> by ColdJ**

I use a antimatter bomb to destroy Venus. 

I teleport to Mars and detonates the bomb. 

My space.

An antimatter bomb big enough to take out Venus destabalises the entire solar system, everything falls into the sun and nothing is left. I set up my hill in a parralel universe.

My Parralel Universe.

You forget to choose a stabilize Parallel universe. 

My emptiness. 

**Edited <time datetime="2022-03-01T12:18:04Z" title="03/01/2022 12:18  PM" data-short="2 yr">March 1, 2022</time> by Abel101126**

Big Bang.

My exponential growth.

I destroyed this universe and make a new one without any War. 

My peace.

In a different universe alltogether.

My Hill.

I wouldn't take your hill. 

Peace.

Happy Peace.

Everywhere including my hill.

I build <abbr title="Kerbal Space Center">KSC</abbr> on your hill. 

<abbr title="Kerbal Space Center">KSC</abbr>.

I build Kerbin in your universe.

My planet.

I build a nuclear missile base on Kerbin. 

My base.
I ring it with anti nuke Star wars satellites from the 80's
I use a Soviet Union's military space station to destroy the satellite.

The thousand other satellites fry the space station. It falls and creates.

My new hill.

**Edited <time datetime="2022-03-01T12:51:34Z" title="03/01/2022 12:51  PM" data-short="2 yr">March 1, 2022</time> by ColdJ**

> 
> 
> 2 hours ago, Abel101126 said:
> 
> 
> I use a antimatter bomb to destroy Venus.
> 

![KindheartedNervousCornsnake-size_restric](https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/835347578988003328/948201623828705290/KindheartedNervousCornsnake-size_restricted.gif)

Anti-Hill Missiles. Boom.

My pile of Debris Hill.

I fix that hill and leave.

I find a new venus, and make a base on it. I arm it with all matter of defensive weapons, and ask you to kindly go away and let me have my hill.
Your hill is safe from me as my hill is on Kerbin you see.
And the Cold and Fluffy hills had peace forever more.
